message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that $10000 is your maximum budget for the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. What do you think?
